--- Azafroth / Ikoto / Pacifix / Swoop / Crossroads ---

Azafroth frowns as the bot escapes through a hole in the roofing. 
He immediately places another though into Pacifix' head, << That 
bot that JetV put into the CR chamber needs to be killed or 
disabled and left behind before we leave. I'd better get in there 
quickly. We don't want him sabotaging the ship>> He shimmers as 
he watches his plans unfolding.

Pacifix is struck by another though, <<That bot that JetV put into 
the CR chamber needs to be killed or disabled and left behind 
before we leave. I'd better get in there quickly.>> He says to 
Ironhide, Sunstreaker, and Hoist who just arrived, "Ok there is still 
another one inside the ship, I've got to get rid of him before we 
leave, he could sabotage the ship." He rushes off, entering the ship.

Crossroads follows Pacifix, trying to find out what was going on.

Swoop lands near Grimlock. "Me Swoop happy battle is finished."

OOC leaving for school, short ending to post =P




On 8 Jun 2001, at 9:06, CYBERWOLF4 wrote:

> Arty's hit hard with the two missles, coolant and energeon begin to
> leak out the cracks in his armored hide. "Branded, I could use some
> backup!" he called over his comm. recieving static he tried again,
> "SwitchBlade, Dogged, anyone come in, I'm hurting here, would someone
> fragging answer me?" he was fealing overcome with fear, he'd either
> been abandoned or the others were destroyed. either way it meant he
> was in big trouble. "That does it, I'm outta here." his misslerack
> wings fold to the side and propell him through one of the holes in the
> roof. If things were that bad he'd have to start sending resumes out,
> maybe the combaticons were hireing an extra, then he thought "Naaaaaa"
> he knew what always happened to extras. ----- Original Message -----
